title: The Ultimate mATX Case?  Corsair 280X Review
description: Ever since we saw it at Computex, we knew the Corsair Crystal Series 280X needed to be reviewed.  it is minimalist, looks great and has an interesting dual chamber design.  But is this matx gaming case any good!  ----------------------------------------------------- Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Massdrop P37x:   Corsair 280X:   Lian Li PC-O11 AIR:   Lian Li PC-O11 Dynamic:   Sapphire Vega56:   ASUS B350 TUF:   Cryorig H7 Air Cooler:   -----------------------------------------------------  Subscribe   Subscribe to Boot Sequence   Review unit provided free of charge by Corsair. This video is sponsored by the Canadian Men's Health Foundation. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #corsair280x #matxcase #hardwarecanucks
